<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Reset the task to free any resources. We need this to happen &#42;before&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we notify anyone (via Outstanding) that this thread is done to ensure</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that we don&#39;t proceed with JIT shutdown while still holding resources.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (E.g. this was causing &quot;Dangling SymbolStringPtr&quot; assertions).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end this thread.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
